item.title: Beogram 4002 (5513): More RPM Measurements
item.description:
Following up on the Beogram 4002 (5513) from the previous day, I conducted an overnight RPM (revolutions per minute) performance test using my BeoloverRPM device. The resulting measurement curve demonstrates excellent performance, typical of DC motor models. It shows minimal fluctuations (less than 0.05%) over time, aligning with the service manual’s specifications. The initial upward slope, lasting a couple of hours, is a common trait in the 551x and 552x models...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4002-5513-more-rpm-measurements/

item.title: Beogram 4002 (5513): Initial RPM Performance Characterization
item.description:
This post follows up on my initial writing about the Beogram 4002 (5513). I used my recently created BeoloverRPM device to assess the unit’s RPM performance. This test clearly showed the suspected rapid speed changes. The graph below displays the RPM over a roughly 24-hour period. The abrupt negative spikes in the graph indicate that the DC motor and its control system require attention...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4002-5513-initial-rpm-performance-characterization/

item.title: Beogram 4002 (5514): RPM Performance Measurement after Restoration of DC Motor and Control System
item.description:
Following the restoration of a Beogram 4002 (5514) turntable’s DC motor and control system, a 24-hour RPM performance test was conducted using a custom-built RPM monitoring device. The initial performance, measured before the restoration, revealed noticeable, abrupt drops in RPM, indicating typical wear and tear in the DC motor’s brass sleeve bearings. These dips, while moderate in this instance, would have been audible due to their 1% magnitude. After the restoration, which included rebuilding the motor and replacing RPM-related components, the significant RPM fluctuations were eliminated...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4002-5514-rpm-performance-measurement-after-restoration-of-dc-motor-and-control-system/

item.title: Beogram 4002 (5513): RPM Stability Test and an Updated Display on the BeoloverRPM Device
item.description:
I dedicated time to program the compact display integrated into my BeoloverRPM device. This enhancement enables precise RPM adjustments and long-term RPM stability analysis. The display now includes minimum and maximum values, along with the total measurement duration. Here’s a glimpse of the display: The display boasts high resolution and excellent contrast. However, those of us who are getting older might need reading glasses to decipher the small font. Is perfection ever attainable?..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4002-5513-rpm-stability-test-and-an-updated-display-on-the-beoloverrpm-device/
